biography: Joni, a familiar name from Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his reserved demeanor off the course, which sharply contrasts with his aggressive play on the greens. His strategic mind and unwavering focus have made him a formidable opponent in past Hector Trophée tournaments.

Joni has participated in the Hector Trophée once, securing a memorable victory that etched his name in the tournament's history. Although he never managed to win the Victor Trophy, Joni's consistent performance has always made him one of the players to watch.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, Joni's absence from the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will be noted by fans and competitors alike. However, in the unpredictable world of golf, a return is always a possibility.
